title: CryptoCommodity
author: CryptoCommodity
created_time: July 11, 2011, 08:17:54 PMLast edit: April 02, 2013, 06:05:28 PM by BadBear
content: [Mod note: many of the image links in this thread are NSFW.]In an effort to show support for Bitcoin and collect the bounty in this thread http://forum.bitcoin.org/index.php?topic=24176.40 the first Bitcoin Tattoo is in the process of being done.Finished workhttp://cryptocommodity.org/tats/1sm.jpghttp://cryptocommodity.org/tats/2sm.jpghttp://cryptocommodity.org/tats/3sm.jpgHere is a pic of the stencil before it is started.http://anonymouse.org/cgi-bin/anon-www.cgi/http://anonymouse.org/cgi-bin/anon-www.cgi/http://anonymouse.org/cgi-bin/anon-www.cgi/http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/566/photo7cd.jpgAnd a link to the Youtube video of the start of the tattoo http://youtu.be/9d_fLh_Vn4o.More video and pics of the final product to follow.--------Mod Note, image links dead, some rehosted below. Youtube link still works.NSFW https://i.imgur.com/7BEmn.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/DObMUGS.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/4J7rmCm.jpghttps://i.imgur.com/UmyDGSH.jpg

comments.author: jack102938
comments.body: What's with the 1-12 numbers? Also, I hate it.

comments.author: CryptoCommodity
comments.body: 1-12 numbers aren't part of the tattoo, only the stencil to line up the 0s and 1s.

comments.author: PLATO
comments.body: ATM the zeros and ones encode the number 1950. Is this meaningful? Maybe do 2011 (011111011011) instead?edit: guess its too late for that. kudos to you! when will it be completed?

comments.author: CryptoCommodity
comments.created_time: July 11, 2011, 08:31:13 PMLast edit: July 12, 2011, 11:29:17 PM by theymos
comments.body: The numbers have meaning.Another pic with some of the color.http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/3583/photo8nc.jpgWork is being done at Voodoo Tattoo in Las Vegas, NV www.voodootattoolv.com.

comments.author: PLATO
comments.body: What's the other ink up north

comments.author: Jalum
comments.body: Have you received the bitcoins yet?

comments.author: bitbot
comments.body: dont expect anyone to stay down there after seeing that weird tattoo

comments.author: AtlasONo
comments.body: Now you need a couple coins from coined bits for nipple covers

comments.author: airdata
comments.body: Quote from: bitbot on July 11, 2011, 08:49:25 PMdont expect anyone to stay down there after seeing that weird tattooROFL.What was the bounty up to for the bitcoin tattoo ?  Did OP split w\ the victim ?  Or is she an early adopter w\ valid reasons to brand herself for life?

comments.author: Jalum
comments.body: She's some young homeless girl isn't she?

comments.author: MeSarah
comments.body: I dont think thats a real tatoo. I dont see any swelling or scabbing and it looks different in the two ink'd images. If it is real, we have a Darwin Award winner!! Stupid is as stupid does.

comments.author: cypherdoc
comments.body: she could afford to lose some weight.
